file_content.text: I'm glad to see that my information was taken seriously. Your diversionary attack is quite impressive.
I can't do much to help you until you reach the facility entrance. We'll talk further there.
I do not follow your beck and call, droid. You will serve me.
We'll talk now!
I help you because I choose to--I do not answer to your authority, nor any other.
I take it we have you to thank for guiding us here?
Our mysterious benefactor?
That's a very nice offer for a droid calling out of nowhere.
How suspicious of you.
My information is the only reason you are here--and I will continue to help if you will listen.
You've done a great deal to help us already, I think.
Our informant?
That was only the beginning of the task before us.
We'll talk inside--and I expect some answers.
As you wish.
You will have them.
I can easily tear this place apart on my own.
I don't need help.
But not as quickly as with my help.
Time is limited. Find your way to the facility entrance, and we'll speak in person.
So you took my warnings seriously, then. Very encouraging. Your diversion is very impressive, as well.
There isn't much I can do for you until you've reached the facility entrance. Find your way there and we'll talk more.
You must be the one who led us here.
Our informant?
Correct. But I can do much more than that.
We're talking now. Why not say what you wish to say?
Why wait?
Some matters must be discussed in person.
I'm not going anywhere until I know who you are.
Identify yourself!
I am the only reason you are here. I am the only reason you will succeed here. That should be enough.
Odd way to say hello to guests, but no big deal. Who do I see for a pool pass?
Who are you, the greeter?
A joke. This is not an efficient form of conversation.
Once we're inside the facility, we'll plan our next move.
Very well.
Very good.
Surely you could do something to thin out the security a bit.
Why can't you help now?
I'm afraid not. I have some access to interior systems, but none for the outer defenses.
Hurry to the facility entrance. We do not have much time.
